info.title: Pets REST API
info.description:
## Overview

The **Pets REST API** allows you to manage your pets.

Powered by [JSight](http://jsight.io)Â©.

children.scalarValue: Something bad had happened on server...

http GET /cats/{id}.annotation: Get a cat by its id.

http GET /dogs.annotation: Get the paged list of all dogs.

http POST /dogs.description:
### Limitations

- Accounts are limited to 25 new dogs 
  within a 24 hour period.

http GET /dogs/{id}.annotation: Get a dog by its id.

http GET /pigs.annotation: Get the list of all pigs.

http GET /pigs/{id}.annotation: Get a pig by its id.

http PUT /pigs/{id}.annotation: Change a pig by its id.

http DELETE /pigs/{id}.annotation: Delete a pig by its id.
